compliant.section: 您可參閱本隱私權政策的〈網站〉一節。
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject should be informed of the identity and contact details of the controller and, where applicable, of the controller's representative... The data subject should be informed of the contact details of the data protection officer, where applicable.

compliant.section: 您可參閱本隱私權政策的〈您在使用我們的網站期間內的揭露資訊〉一節，瞭解我們如何透過購物車供應商管理您的資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Where personal data relating to a data subject are collected from the data subject, the controller shall, at the time when personal data are obtained, provide the data subject with all of the following information: ... the purposes of the processing for which the personal data are intended as well as the legal basis for the processing; ... where the controller intends to process the personal data for a purpose other than that for which the personal data were collected, the controller shall provide the data subject, prior to that further processing, with information on that other purpose and with any relevant further information as referred to in paragraph 1.

non_compliant.section: 揭露您在使用我們的電腦軟體期間內的資訊
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject should be informed of the period for which the personal data will be stored, or if that is not possible, the criteria used to determine that period... The data subject should be informed of the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to processing as well as the right to data portability.
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state the period for which the data collected through the computer software will be stored. It should also inform users of their rights regarding their data, including access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, objection to processing, and data portability.

non_compliant.section:
透過我們的電腦軟體購買產品時
我們的電腦軟體可做為您在線上購買我們產品的管道。您一開始從我們的電腦軟體購買訊連科技產品時，會導向到我們的網站
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be: (a) processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner in relation to the data subject ('lawfulness, fairness and transparency'); (b) collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes; further processing for archiving purposes in the public interest, scientific or historical research purposes or statistical purposes shall, in accordance with Article 89(1), not be considered to be incompatible with the initial purposes ('purpose limitation');
non_compliant.amend: This section should specify the legal basis for processing data collected through the software, especially when redirecting users to the website for purchases. It should also clarify if the data collected through the software is used for any purposes other than facilitating the purchase, and if so, the legal basis for such processing.

non_compliant.section: 瞭解我們如何透過購物車供應商管理您的資訊
non_compliant.legal provisions: Where personal data relating to a data subject are collected from the data subject, the controller shall, at the time when personal data are obtained, provide the data subject with all of the following information: ... the recipients or categories of recipients of the personal data, if any;
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly identify the shopping cart provider and specify whether they act as a data processor or a separate data controller. It should also clarify what data is shared with the shopping cart provider and for what purposes.
